revised_title: Experiments on the Torsional Modulus of Various Woods and Metals
tldr: The author conducts extensive experiments on the torsional modulus of various woods and metals, providing a comprehensive table of results for practical engineers and mechanics. The study reveals the relationship between the modulus of torsion and the specific gravity of different wood species, as well as the comparison between the torsional modulus and the modulus of elasticity in metals.
